Text: Support the Broncos and the WTC VictimsThis really only takes seconds See below I just did it Its fast and easy So no excuses for not getting soup donated All of you have minute to spare People in New York and DC are going to be having to hit foodbanks hard There will be a need in NY for the soup Below is an easy way to help Campbells is donating a can of soup to area foodbanks just by clicking on a football helmet at their website Now I know there are some pretty diehard football fans out there Lets see which team gets the most support and help some hungry people too Its quick easy and can be done once a day To date Steelers have about cans donated Green Bay has over The Broncos only have Come of Fans kick in your support Here is a hyper link to directly connect you to their website Just click on this web address clickforcansasp then click on your favorite teams helmet and Campbell will donated a can of soup That is it Please pass this to a friend or
